casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kendrick Donta COLSON. No. 512P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 19, 2007. Haral E. Carlin, for Colson. John Snyder, District Attorney, for State.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 650 S.E.2d 656.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of October 2007 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

*884"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 19th day of October 2007."
